title: Quentin Tarantino tells 'black critics' his race doesn't matter, disses 'Selma'

Published By: Baltimore Sun: Celebrity - Today 
Quentin Tarantino is courting controversy once again, with his less-than-favorable views on "Selma" and comments saying he was persecuted fo...
